entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS8032 for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions with 5.0.100 SDK #82274
  • [wasm] `System.Reflection.Tests.MethodInfoTests.TestFunctionPointers` failing with AOT on linux #82272
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] `System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests` failing with chrome ` Expected 210 assets to be downloaded, but only finished 211` #82271
  • [release/7.0][mono] Coredump on Alpine Linux Edge #82269
  • Test failure in System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests #82266
  • [QUIC] Revisit exceptions in Quic #82262
    8.0.0
  • Empty DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS causes error entries in Application log in Windows. #82260
  • Enable HTTP/3 stress on Windows #82258
    8.0.0
  • ByRef type name created by TypeBuilder and referenced in IL produces wrong result on Mono #82257
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed: GCHeapUtilities::GetGCHeap()->IsInFrozenSegment(obj) #82252
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #82251
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks in .NET 8 does not target .NET 8 #82241
    8.0.0
  • OSX infra issue - prereq check for 'pkg-config' missing #82240
  • "Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program." Exception encountered - on "(dynamic)" method call for overload resolution #82239
  • Consider detecting stalled HTTP/2 connections in SocketsHttpHandler #82236
  • NativeAOT EventPipe library needs to work correctly when EventSource support is enabled #82231
    8.0.0
  • build v7.0.3 hit the error: error ST L1001: Unexpected compiler version, expected MSVC 19.34 or newer. #82229
  • Regressions in System.Hashing.GetStringHashCode #82243
  • Clarification on NuGet versioning with regards to supported SDK/runtime #82225
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation where callee requires no initialization #82224
    Future
  • No well define API to set Process Affinity that works on multi-NUMA-node and multi-cpu-groups #82220
  • BadImageFormatException when calling static virtual method in interface #82217
    8.0.0
  • Some OOB assemblies are not copying intellisense extracted from docs package #82214

Closed

  • JIT/opt/Compares/compares should seemingly not be passing file-check on arm64 #81531
    8.0.0
  • macOS: Cannot add to X509Store #80176
  • Crash when deserializing certain types in Blazor Web Assembly projects when project is published #81746
    8.0.0
  • Binary DataContract Serialization raises exception with certain contents. #81290
  • XML deserialize self closing raw element #80699
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 23 Regressions on 2/9/2023 12:40:40 PM #82111
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext doesn't support function pointer types #43791
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Reflection introspection support for FunctionPointer #69273
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in ConcurrentDictionary #82105
    8.0.0
  • Test failures: jitpartialcompilation_pgo #82128
    8.0.0
  • Can't deserialize object despite custom JsonSerializerContext in Blazor WASM #81709
  • runtime-community pipeline fails to build #82161
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 1/27/2023 2:26:56 PM #81551
    8.0.0
  • Why `System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer` serialize the wrapper properties by default? #82237
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull<T> #82227
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10042) - SetMulticastOption #81507
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #82106
    8.0.0
  • generation of RID graph no longer works #82125
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT codegeneration question #82023
  • LdapConnection Bind() takes longer on Windows 11 #79836
    Future
  • Test failure: Microsoft.DotNet.XUnitExtensions.SkipTestException : Precision on float numbers #82141
  • XUnitLogChecker causes GCStress test failures #82143
    8.0.0
  • Remove MS.Extensions.Logging.Console's dependency on ConfigurationBinder #81931
    8.0.0
  • Mono AOT Compiler packs are missing `data/UnixFilePermissions.xml`? #82201
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [workloads] Bump net7 package version #82270
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [workloads] Backport UsingMobileWorkload change #82268
  • [workload] Upstream net7 manifest json and targets #82267
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix runtime-community pipeline #82265
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Remove duplicate range check in VSB.Append(char) #82264
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82263
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Improved logic of listener AcceptConnection #82261
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [mono][doc] The path of sdkmanager on android_sdk was changed #82256
    area-Meta
  • Avx512 single kmask #82255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor Logging.Console configure options #82254
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasi] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Adding HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #82249
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [6.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82248
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82246
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82245
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Remove iossimulator_x86 from helix-queues-setup.yml #82244
    area-Build-mono
  • [wip] Test ios-arm64 CI job for the dedup improvement #82238
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, Future
  • JIT: Lift remaining cmov restrictions by introducing GT_SELECTCC #82235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Wasi icu test #82233
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Attempt at using newer image to allow H/3 Windows stress #82226
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove EOL Linux versions from runtime graph. #82223
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Split generic virtual method slot use and impl tracking #82222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Use latest sdk 7.0 sdk for workload testing, and perf runs #82219
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Share test cases for NativeAOT #82216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix paths in "Stripping symbols" message #82215
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix clr build on illumos-x64 #82183
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [SuperFileCheck] Added verification when using 'FULL-LINE-NEXT'. Fixing ARM64 comparison tests. #82135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hold temporary keychain refs for certificates imported with X509Certificate2Collection.Import #82205
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Replace `dynamic` with static math in a JIT test #82073
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark DivRem with RequiresPreviewFeatures #82221
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Initialize il_offset for allocated basic blocks #82242
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add copyright info to eventpipe shim files #82232
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Mark .overrides from marked methods in a copy assembly #82197
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: fix some asserts in profile incorporation and reconstruction #82196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add cmake check for ioclt prototype #82173
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: fix graph not being updated on pack. #82204
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • update alpine test images #81841
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • String.Split() trim last substring if specified #81331
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Update CODEOWNERS #82131
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Skip wasm frames if just my code is enabled #81732
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fill missing @mention data in area-owners.json #82228
    area-Meta
  • Avoid a RIP relative addressing pessimization #82213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include more details in exception from wrong async callback #82104
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: Expand loop detection in if-conversion #82170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Slightly refactor handling of conditions/conditional branches in the backend #82020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix tests to use ConditionalFact that need it #82203
    area-System.Drawing
  • [wasm] Add jiterpreter trace transfer and other optimizations #82149
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Prevent XUnitLogChecker from failing if no logs are found #82212
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove ConfigurationBinder usage from Console Logging #82098
    area-Extensions-Logging, size-reduction
  • Workloads: Fix a regression in file permissions for workload packs #82211
    area-Workloads
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • [MONO] Implement GC.AddMemoryPressure in Mono #82121
    area-GC-mono
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82116
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2116253 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add EventPipe library support to CrossGen2 #82200
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Create source generator for ConfigurationBinder #82179
    NO-REVIEW, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • corehost: derive fallback rid from output rid. #82163
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: don't optimize calls to CORINFO_HELP_VIRTUAL_FUNC_PTR for interface class lookups #82209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Disable additional sourcegenerator tests #82184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Add `WasiAppBuilder` task #82126
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Append leftovers of FromBase64Transform's input buffer to the transform buffer #82148
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Adding more SIMD constant folding support #82190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NativeAOT build integration targets to include ioslike platforms #82086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • Use optimistic concurrency when configuring JsonTypeInfo metadata. #82198
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [JIT] LclMorph `GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR)` => `GT_CAST(GT_LCL_VAR)` narrow-cast only #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build test tree with partial trimming #82157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
